speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with John?

speaker: Customer
text: Who the hell do you think you are? I don’t want to talk to you!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand you're frustrated, John. I just need to verify your identity before discussing any account details. Can you please provide your date of birth?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the f**k do you need that? Just get to the point!

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. It's standard procedure. Your date of birth please?

speaker: Customer
text: It's none of your f***ing business! Just tell me what you want!

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your patience, John, but I can't disclose any account information without verifying your identity. Can you confirm your address instead?

speaker: Customer
text: Just f*** off already! I’m not giving you anything!

speaker: Agent
text: I truly understand your concerns. However, I need this information to assist you effectively. Your address, please?

speaker: Customer
text: This is a waste of my time! Why can't you just say what you need?

speaker: Agent
text: I assure you, I'm here to help, John. I just need a little more information. Can you provide your current address?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m not telling you s**t! Just drop it!

speaker: Agent
text: I respect your decision, John. Please know that I'm here if you change your mind. Thank you for your time.
